.. py:class:: NeuronTypes

   Bases: :py:obj:`enum.Enum`

   Enum class containing neuron types: excitatory and inhibitory.

   .. py:attribute:: E
      :annotation: = excitatory

      

   .. py:attribute:: I
      :annotation: = inhibitory
